summary: Most requested UI/theme changes appear implemented (navbar layout/style, dark+pink theme utilities, redesigned Home/Vote/Discord/Shop pages, favicon/logo references). However, the diff does not show the required generated image assets being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and several unrelated new features/components were introduced (profile setup, admin management, UPI QR modal, theme toggle, query caching changes).

missing_requirements.requirement: Store required generated images in frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (logo, favicon, hero background).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the app referencing /assets/generated/... images, but the diff reports no added files, so there is no evidence that the required generated image files were actually added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile setup/user profile management (new query hooks and non-dismissible ProfileSetupModal shown in Layout).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on redesigning navbar and homepage sections + applying theme; it does not request collecting/storing user profile name/Minecraft username or gating UX with a mandatory modal.
Not requested; requirements specify a coherent CupCakeMC theme but do not ask for a user-controlled theme switcher.

hallucinated_features.description: UPI QR code modal that generates QR codes using an external QR Server API.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also goes beyond "do not change shop/checkout business logic unless required purely for styling/layout consistency" by introducing a new payment UX path and calling an external API.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin dashboard enhancements including head-admin-only admin management (add/remove admin).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the redesign requirements (REQ-1..REQ-7) which are focused on homepage/navbar/theme/assets.
Not requested; unrelated to the UI redesign requirements.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/App.tsx: aggressive caching, route preloading, Suspense boundaries)
